item.title: Using CDK to deploy AWS managed Active Directory
item.description: CIFS (Common Internet File System) and SMB (Server Message Block) are both Windows file-sharing protocols used in storage systems. As part of a new demo/blog post that looks at how to use data stored on SMB/CIF file shares with Apache Airflow, I have been exploring the various options of creating SMB/CIF compatible resources. (There are LOTS of ways you could do this, so there is plenty for me to play around with!
